CustomField.description: Determines if the unit test is now passing when it was previously failing.
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(PreviousMethodResults__c)) && PreviousMethodResults__r.Method_Pass__c == FALSE && Method_Pass__c == TRUE, TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines if the unit test is now passing when it was previously failing.
CustomField.label: Test Fixed From Previous Result
